document.full_text: a cleveland city employee whose april fools' day prank brought law enforcement and emergency response workers rushing to city hall was handed a 10-day suspension without pay on wednesday and charged with making a false alarm.
document.title: april fools' joke goes wrong for cleveland woman
lines_and_colors: a cleveland city employee whose april fools' day prank brought law enforcement and emergency response workers rushing to city hall was handed a 10-day suspension without pay on wednesday and charged with making a false alarm.
